response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align perfectly with your needs. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product for $9,500. This special price is designed to provide you with a significant advantage over the market value while ensuring you receive the best possible deal. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 9500}
